item.title: Environmental treaties
item.description: manyenviron is a data package in the many universe of packages. It currently includes an ensemble of datasets on international environmental agreements, and statesâ€™ membership or other relationships to those agreements.

item.title: Have democracies become more free and accountable since the 1990s?
How Do Environmental Treaties Connect?
item.description: Want to try yourself? Please feel free to play with data on environmental treaties lineages! What about country memberships in environmental treaties, are you interested in that?

item.title: How to match agreements across different datasets?
The PANARCHIC Project
item.description: Led by Dr. James Hollway, hosted at the Centre for International and Environmental Studies (CIES), and funded by the Swiss National Science Foundation (SNSF), the “PANARCHIC: Power and Networks and the Rate of Change in Institutional Complexes” project has started in Semptember 2020.

item.title: What Does Global Health Governance Look Like?
